Or some of the missing to your own life right
[noise] you know I think that's true um I've been very fortunate to me family of people who have been lost and when you meet these people it really brings brings home the emotion and [noise]

You know one place in the new book you mentioned how as a rule you did not reach out to the families of the missing now sometimes you meet him in ... due to various circumstances but in general you don't call somebody up out of the blue and say hey can I talk to you about your dad loved one or you're missing loved one because it seems like an invisible line that you don't want to cross over but I Wonder
Has the success of your books help in the sense that these families now reach out to you that they're unsatisfied say with the the search effort or something and they're they're turning to you for some help her answers
